name: betterdiscord
description: Enhances Discord by adding functionality and themes.

scripts.install: cd injector && npm install && cd ../renderer && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build-injector && npm run build-renderer
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod --prefix injector && npm run build-prod --prefix renderer
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js common/ && npm run lint --prefix injector && npm run lint --prefix renderer
